categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: The Weapons Development Facility was a facility on the Mid Rim world of Naboo used for the development of weapons. It was nestled within the planet's Gallo Mountains and was hotly contested between forces of the Galactic Empire and Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. Following the Battle of Restuss, the facility was the site of regular fighting between both factions.

The Weapons Development Facility was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. The Weapons Development Facility was added to the game with the release of "Chapter 2: The Talus Incident", on August 1, 2006. It was one of the three main base's that players of each faction could capture, along with the Corellian Tactical Training Facility and the Talus Weapons Depot.
